verses.text_plain: And the Lord spake unto Moses, saying,
verses.verse_html: 1And the Lord spake unto Moses, saying,

verses.text_plain: See, I have called by name Bezaleel the son of Uri, the son of Hur, of the tribe of Judah:
verses.verse_html: 2See, I have called by name Bezaleel the son of Uri, the son of Hur, of the tribe of Judah:

verses.text_plain: And I have filled him with the spirit of God, in wisdom, and in understanding, and in knowledge, and in all manner of workmanship,
verses.verse_html: 3And I have filled him with the spirit of God, in wisdom, and in understanding, and in knowledge, and in all manner of workmanship,

tokens.text: and in all manner of workmanship

verses.text_plain: To devise cunning works, to work in gold, and in silver, and in brass,
verses.verse_html: 4To devise cunning works, to work in gold, and in silver, and in brass,

verses.text_plain: And in cutting of stones, to set them, and in carving of timber, to work in all manner of workmanship.
verses.verse_html: 5And in cutting of stones, to set them, and in carving of timber, to work in all manner of workmanship.

verses.text_plain: And I, behold, I have given with him Aholiab, the son of Ahisamach, of the tribe of Dan: and in the hearts of all that are wise hearted I have put wisdom, that they may make all that I have commanded thee;
verses.verse_html: 6And I, behold, I have given with him Aholiab, the son of Ahisamach, of the tribe of Dan: and in the hearts of all that are wise hearted I have put wisdom, that they may make all that I have commanded thee;

tokens.text: And I, behold, I have given

verses.text_plain: The tabernacle of the congregation, and the ark of the testimony, and the mercy seat that is thereupon, and all the furniture of the tabernacle,
verses.verse_html:
7The tabernacle of the congregation, and the ark of the testimony, and the mercy seat that is thereupon, and all the furniture of the tabernacle, ▼
▼ furniture: Heb. vessels

verses.text_plain: And the table and his furniture, and the pure candlestick with all his furniture, and the altar of incense,
verses.verse_html:
8And the table and his furniture, and the pure candlestick with all his furniture, and the altar of incense, ▼
▼ furniture: Heb. vessels

verses.text_plain: And the altar of burnt offering with all his furniture, and the laver and his foot,
verses.verse_html:
9And the altar of burnt offering with all his furniture, and the laver and his foot, ▼
▼ furniture: Heb. vessels

verses.text_plain: And the cloths of service, and the holy garments for Aaron the priest, and the garments of his sons, to minister in the priest’s office,
verses.verse_html: 10And the cloths of service, and the holy garments for Aaron the priest, and the garments of his sons, to minister in the priest’s office,

tokens.text: to minister in the priest’s office

verses.text_plain: And the anointing oil, and sweet incense for the holy place: according to all that I have commanded thee shall they do.
verses.verse_html: 11And the anointing oil, and sweet incense for the holy place: according to all that I have commanded thee shall they do.

tokens.text: according to all that I have commanded

verses.text_plain: And the Lord spake unto Moses, saying,
verses.verse_html: 12And the Lord spake unto Moses, saying,

verses.text_plain: Speak thou also unto the children of Israel, saying, Verily my sabbaths ye shall keep: for it is a sign between me and you throughout your generations; that ye may know that I am the Lord that doth sanctify you.
verses.verse_html: 13Speak thou also unto the children of Israel, saying, Verily my sabbaths ye shall keep: for it is a sign between me and you throughout your generations; that ye may know that I am the Lord that doth sanctify you.

tokens.text: between me and you throughout your generations

verses.text_plain: Ye shall keep the sabbath therefore; for it is holy unto you: every one that defileth it shall surely be put to death: for whosoever doeth any work therein, that soul shall be cut off from among his people.
verses.verse_html: 14Ye shall keep the sabbath therefore; for it is holy unto you: every one that defileth it shall surely be put to death: for whosoever doeth any work therein, that soul shall be cut off from among his people.

tokens.text: unto you: every one that defileth

verses.text_plain: Six days may work be done; but in the seventh is the sabbath of rest, holy to the Lord: whosoever doeth any work in the sabbath day, he shall surely be put to death.
verses.verse_html:
15Six days may work be done; but in the seventh is the sabbath of rest, holy to the Lord: whosoever doeth any work in the sabbath day, he shall surely be put to death. ▼
▼ holy: Heb. holiness

verses.text_plain: Wherefore the children of Israel shall keep the sabbath, to observe the sabbath throughout their generations, for a perpetual covenant.
verses.verse_html: 16Wherefore the children of Israel shall keep the sabbath, to observe the sabbath throughout their generations, for a perpetual covenant.

verses.text_plain: It is a sign between me and the children of Israel for ever: for in six days the Lord made heaven and earth, and on the seventh day he rested, and was refreshed.
verses.verse_html: 17It is a sign between me and the children of Israel for ever: for in six days the Lord made heaven and earth, and on the seventh day he rested, and was refreshed.

verses.text_plain: And he gave unto Moses, when he had made an end of communing with him upon mount Sinai, two tables of testimony, tables of stone, written with the finger of God.
verses.verse_html: 18And he gave unto Moses, when he had made an end of communing with him upon mount Sinai, two tables of testimony, tables of stone, written with the finger of God.

tokens.text: when he had made an end
